articles.description: Leandro Trossard's second-half goal is enough for Arsenal to overcome a stubborn Fulham and move three points clear at the top of the Premier League.
articles.title: Fulham 0-1 Arsenal: Arsenal top again after Leandro Trossard goal sinks Fulham

articles.description: Follow live text updates and listen to BBC Radio 5 Sports Extra 2 commentary of the sprint race at the United States Grand Prix.
articles.title: F1 sprint race LIVE: US Grand Prix 2025 times, results, radio & updates from Austin

articles.description: Ange Postecoglou had only just moved into his new flat when he was sacked by Nottingham Forest, ending one of the shortest reigns in Premier League history.
articles.title: Nottingham Forest: 'Sacked Ange Postecoglou was not the right fit'

articles.description: McLaren F1 bosses blame rival drivers for the crash between Oscar Piastri and Lando Norris at the start of the United States Grand Prix sprint race.
articles.title: US Grand Prix: McLaren blame rivals for Oscar Piastri-Lando Norris collision in sprint race

articles.description: Barcelona defender Ronald Araujo comes on as a late substitute before scoring a dramatic winner against Girona.
articles.title: Barcelona 2-1 Girona: Ronald Araujo stoppage-time winner sends Barca top of La Liga

articles.description: Ange Postecoglou is sacked by Nottingham Forest after a 3-0 defeat by Chelsea just 39 days after being appointed as head coach.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou: Nottingham Forest sack manager after just 39 days in charge

articles.description: Ferrari chairman John Elkann says the company has "full confidence" in team principal Frederic Vasseur.
articles.title: Ferrari has 'full confidence' in team boss Frederic Vasseur, says chairman John Elkann

articles.description: Erling Haaland is getting so good he is starting to break his own records, following a double for Manchester City against Everton on Saturday.
articles.title: Man City 2-0 Everton: Erling Haaland looks 'superhuman' but must others step up?

articles.description: Jean-Philippe Mateta scores a hat-trick, including a stoppage-time penalty, as Crystal Palace fight back from two goals down to draw with Bournemouth.
articles.title: Crystal Palace 3-3 AFC Bournemouth: Jean-Philippe Mateta hat-trick salvages draw

articles.description: Interim head coach Steven Smith questions Rangers' mentality and habits after the Ibrox side's draw with Dundee United.
articles.title: Different coach, same Rangers - Steven Smith questions mentality after Dundee Utd draw
